sentences.en: I managed to wrest the photograph from his grasp.
sentences.cn: 我设法把他攥在手里的照片夺了过来。

sentences.en: I tried to wrest the gun from his hands.
sentences.cn: 我试图把枪从他手中夺过来.

sentences.en: Please wrest the water faucettap back after turning off it, with thanks!
sentences.cn: 请将水龙头关好之后往回拧一下.谢谢配合!

sentences.en: Political leaders vowed to wrest back command of their destinies from out - of - control markets.
sentences.cn: 各国首脑誓言,要从失控的市场手中夺回命运的主宰权.

sentences.en: The bully tried to wrest the ball from the smaller boy's hands.
sentences.cn: 那个恃强凌弱的家伙企图从比他小的男孩手中夺走皮球.

sentences.en: The men had returned to wrest back power.
sentences.cn: 这些人已经回来以图重新夺取权力。

sentences.en: The officer managed to wrest the gun from his grasp.
sentences.cn: 警官最终把枪从他手中夺走了.

sentences.en: They are fighting to wrest control of the party from the old leaders.
sentences.cn: 他们正极力从老一辈领导人手中夺取对党的控制权。

sentences.en: They plotted to wrest power from the king.
sentences.cn: 他们图谋篡夺国王的权力.

sentences.en: They tried to wrest control of the company from him.
sentences.cn: 他们试图从他手中夺取对该公司的控制权.

sentences.en: Thou shalt not wrest the judgment of thy poor in his cause.
sentences.cn: 6不可在穷人争讼的事上屈枉正直.

sentences.en: To wriggle is to wrest about like a worm.
sentences.cn: 蠕动就是像虫子一样扭来扭去.

sentences.en: Try as we would ; we could not wrest the secret from him.
sentences.cn: 我们尽管 想方设法 也无法从他那里获得那个秘密.

sentences.en: Wrest the trident out of her hand.
sentences.cn: 把它手里的三叉戟夺过来.

sentences.en: You were very brave to wrest the knife from the murderer.
sentences.cn: 你们非常勇敢地从凶手手里夺下了那把刀.

sentences.en: You wrest my words from their real meaning.
sentences.cn: 你曲解了我的话的真实含义.

sentences.en: You wrest my words out of their real meaning.
sentences.cn: 你曲解了我话里的真正含义.

trans.tran_cn: 扭， 拧； 夺取， 费力取得
trans.tran_en: to take power or influence away from someone, especially when this is difficult

trans.tran_cn: （用力）拧，扭，<文>费力取得，歪曲（事实等），曲解，扭夺，夺取，抢去
